h2. macro's

executed at load of appserver (loading of wiki pages)
* [Preprocess Macros|/system/Explorer/?path=wikimacros/preprocess/]
execute always, so dynamic output can be created, output of these macro's is confluence format
* [Wiki Macros|/system/Explorer/?path=wikimacros/wiki/]
the last step, executes after the wiki macro's ,these macros manipulate a page object (default an html page object)
* [Page Macros|/system/Explorer/?path=wikimacros/page/]
